Bookmark App

Name Category Language Date Added Edit Button Delete Button
{{ bookmark.name }} {{ bookmark.category }} {{ bookmark.language }} {{ bookmark.dateAdded }} Edit
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Bookmark } from '../Models/bookmark.interface'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent { bookmarks: Bookmark[] = [ { id: 1, name: 'test', category: 'string', language: 'test', dateAdded: new Date() }, { id: 2, name: 'test2', category: 'string2', language: 'test2', dateAdded: new Date() }, { id: 3, name: 'test3', category: 'string3', language: 'test3', dateAdded: new Date() } ]; deleteBookmark(bookmarkId: number): void { this.bookmarks = this.bookmarks.filter(bookmark => bookmark.id !== bookmarkId); } }
